select id, leave_type, start_date, end_date, reason, create_user, create_date, edit_user, edit_date, proc_inst_id_ as process_instance_id, workFlowStatus from sample_work_flow t left join ( select business_key_, proc_inst_id_, if(delete_reason_ is null, IF(end_time_ is null, concat('[', t.name_, ']', if(nickname is null, '未签收', nickname)), '已办结'), '已撤销') as workFlowStatus from( select ahp.proc_inst_id_, ahp.business_key_, ahp.delete_reason_, aht.name_, su.nickname, aht.start_time_, ahp.end_time_, row_number() over (partition by business_key_ order by aht.start_time_ desc) as ranker from act_hi_procinst ahp left join act_hi_taskinst aht on aht.proc_inst_id_ = ahp.proc_inst_id_ left join sys_user su on su.id = aht.assignee_ order by aht.start_time_ desc ) t where ranker = 1 ) business_status on business_status.business_key_ = t.id
